detailsOfAchievement: ITCon Skill Development Foundation is an ISO 9001:2008 certified premier skill development Organization, recognized by the Central Govt. as authorized training partner under the NSDC Star scheme, with over 30 years of experience in providing high quality Education and vocational training of the unemployed youth necessary to upgrade the lifestyle of the trainees and enhance the employment opportunities for them. We committed to provide high quality Education and Vocational Training to bridge the gap between demand and supply of skilled manpower across the state. We undergo several survey and skill mapping exercises to identify the possible gaps and henceforth provide the vocational skills necessary to upgrade / prepare the students in lieu with the prevalent Job opportunities and hence a source of livelihood. We are also committed to developing the vocational skill by deploying a team of associates, trainers, faculty members and well equipped high quality skills development centers. ITCon focuses on the employment opportunities of our students in both the organized and unorganized sector. As ITcon has been awarded the recognition to train the trainees under the NSDC Star scheme, Forest Department, Madhya Pradesh Govt. it is more focused and committed towards the conduction of High quality training adhering to the NSDC skill norms to provide exceptional and most skillful training to the youth focusing on the career opportunities, high standard of living and a disciplined lifestyle to follow.

detailsOfAchievement: Jabalpur Diocesan Social Service Society {JDSSS} is a NGO and the social work wing of the Diocese of Jabalpur in Madhya Pradesh. It was established in the year 1979 to carry out the social works in the diocese. The society was registered in the year 1993 under the M.P. Society Registration Act 1973 {JJ-1441}. The operational area of the organization is in 6 districts of M.P i.e. Jabalpur, Mandla, Dindori, Seoni, Narsingpur and Katni. The VISION of our society is Building communities where all enjoy equal rights and opportunities and live in harmony with one another, Nature and the Divine. The MISSION of our Society is Empowering people, especially the vulnerable groups and communities, for sustainable development as well as for accessing rights and opportunities. The major activities of our Society are 1. Animation 2. Vocational Trg. For high school failed girls 3. Masonry training for youth 4. Skill development training for youth (driving, plumbing, electrician etc.) 5. Asha Kiran for HIV affected people 6. Watershed programme 7. Model Rural Agro Enterprise Development Programme 8. Resource in Use Project. 9. Child Focused Community Development Programme. 10. Environment & Forest. 11. Integrated Natural Resource Management 12. Promotion & strengthening of Co-operatives under this programme we formed more than 600 SHGs in different villages in our working areas. In the year of 1995 our Society was honored with a National Award, Indira Priyadarshini Vriksha Mitra Award for the works done in the field of Environment.

detailsOfAchievement: We as a Society doing work to uplift the status of people who is living below poverty line. We generate employment to them through Training / Workshop and different type of activity on which their traditional culture as well as resources are useful to them. We have associated with Science, Economic and Value Addition concept which is basically the need of the citizens. We are presently doing work in Madhya Pradesh. We are going to the Industries based rehabilitation work for those who are basically depends on and around Industrial Estate. In which we will be given Practical Training and find out the potentiality of those person. We then assist to provide market to them so that they will make their product and generate revenue for upgrade their life style. We have undertaken many Projects viz. 1. We have given Training on Entrepreneurship Development Program - Product Development in Jute, Bhopal 2. Job Oriented Program for the Ladies of Below Poverty Line etc. in which we have given Training for making Bag, Gown, Agarbatti, Candle, Paper Envelop, Craft work for School Children (DUDA State Governement Project). 3. Working Women Hostel is running with cooperation of Social Welfare Board (Centrally Sponsored Scheme) 4. Bal Shram Vidhyalay is run by the Society at Pilukhedi Distt. Rajgarh 5. We have organized Workshop of Sculptural Artist activities in Panna, Narsinghgarh and Vidisha District. We have also given awareness program regarding Health, Safety and Environment. 6. Training and Vocational Program on Stitching, Weaving, Agarbatti, Candle making this program is Sponsored by Women and Child Development Department, Government of M.P. 7. We are the Registered Training Center for Stitching, Embroidery and Fashion Designing for Women & Child Development Department, GoMP. In this center we are giving different types of customized training as per the needs of the participants. 8. We do the work for Self Help Group and given training for Stitching, Embroidery, Zari Zardoji. 9. We have organised Workshop on Intellectual Property Right with the association of M.P. Council of Science & Technology, Bhopal. This type of Science Promotional program doing regularly. 10. We have done "Workshop on Gharelu Hinsa" in Kolar Area, Bhopal in which Women of different categories have attended and asked many question related on that. (This program was Sponsored by National Women Commission, New Delhi) 11. We have done "Workshop on Drug Prohibition Week" in Central Jail, Bhopal in which (This program was Sponsored by Panchayat & Social Justice Deptt. M.P., Bhopal) Other than this we have done Several Workshop / Training program specially designs for the artist, which required extensive and advance concept of Global Business.

In these year of formation of the organization like ours ,we learnd a lot from our experience. At this stage ,we have to revisit ourselves to analyses our past , our strengths, weakness, opportunities and threats to prepare an actionable strategy for paving out way for more bright future for both ourselves and our community.
